sections.text:
81-1720.Professional services; selection process; notice; when not required.

Notwithstanding any other provision of sections 81-1701 to 81-1721, there shall be no public notice requirement or utilization of the selection process as provided in sections 81-1701 to 81-1721 for projects in which the agency is able to reuse existing drawings, specifications, and other documents from a prior project.

SourceLaws 1978, LB 715, ยง 20.
